creator: AU Small Finance Bank Limited
descriptionHtml:
AU Mobile App is the official mobile banking app of AU Small Finance Bank. Manage Accounts, Transfer Funds, Pay Bills, Save & Invest, Book Tickets: You can do all of it through just ONE APP. The app is secure, easy to use, addresses everyday banking and lifestyle needs. Login using just your Fingerprint and explore a world of possibilities from anywhere and at any time.

With over 100+ banking and non-banking services available, you can do so much with the app.

• Check Account Balances and request for detailed statements, cheque books
• Open Fixed Deposits/Recurring Deposits
• Transfer funds using various payment options: IMPS/NEFT/RTGS/UPI
• Do multiple fund transfers in just one transaction
• Easily schedule payments and manage transfer limits
• Book Flights/Bus/Cab/Hotel tickets
• Manage your Debit Cards
• Set automatic payment of regular Bills
• Manage Mutual Fund Investments
• Enjoy great offers under the offer section
• Book locker facilities at our branches
• Apply for new shares listed on the exchanges (IPOs)

And a lot more…

Please note we use multi-level security and you can be rest assured that your data is safe with AU Small Finance Bank. We do not share any information with third parties without your initiation and confirmation.

Download AU Mobile app today and enjoy super convenient digital life with us. For any feedback, queries or issues pertaining to AU Mobile application, please write to tech.support@aubank.in


Steps to register

1. Download AU Mobile application
2. Open mobile application and give permission as required
3. Post granting permission, click on register
4. If you have dual SIMs in your phone, select the SIM (mobile number) which is registered with the bank
5. App will ask for permission to send SMS (from registered mobile number) for device binding
a. In case of Android the SMS will be sent in background
b. In case of iOS, the application will navigate to native SMS application with pre-filled details, here click send without changing the SMS content
6. Once device binding is completed, you are required to select desired Customer ID, in case the mobile number is registered to multiple CIFs
7. Set mPIN and confirm mPIN
8. Enter Debit Card Details for authentication i.e. Debit Card Number and ATM PIN. This step is optional, however if skipped, you will only be provided with view access
9. Enable biometric for login for added security, this is optional and asked only if you have registered your fingerprint on your device
10. You are now registered for AU Mobile Banking
11. You can login using mPIN set in step 7 or biometric set in step 9
descriptionShort: Live smarter with AU Mobile (official app of AU Bank), enjoy 100+ services

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: We're giving the app a fresh new look. Enjoy the latest features and offers from new AU Mobile.

title: AU Mobile

creator: AU Small Finance Bank Limited
descriptionHtml:
AU 0101 App is the result of our vision for secure and intuitive digital banking that is meant to be convenient, flexible and customer-focused to transform the way you bank. You can now manage your A/c, Book Fixed Deposit, raise service requests over Video Call, Transfer funds, apply for a Car / Personal Loan, invest in IPO / Mutual Funds etc., Make UPI payments, set up bill payments, book a cab / bus / flight and much more.


Here’s what you can do with the app:
• Get assistance in booking a Fixed Deposit, paying taxes, transferring funds via Video Banking
• Invest in Mutual Funds, IPOs & Equities
• Check Account Balance and request for detailed statements, cheque books etc.
• Open Fixed Deposits/Recurring Deposits
• Transfer funds using various payment options: IMPS/NEFT/RTGS/UPI
• Do multiple fund transfers in just one transaction
• Easily schedule payments and manage transfer limits
• Book Hotel, Cab, Flights & Bus tickets
• Manage your Debit Cards
• Set automatic payment of regular Bills
• Enjoy great offers under the offer section
• Book locker facilities at our branches
• Apply for new shares listed on the exchanges (IPOs)

And a lot more…


Please note we use multi-level security and encryptions for you to be rest assured that your data is safe with AU Small Finance Bank. We do not share any information with third parties without your initiation and confirmation.


Download AU 0101 today and enjoy super convenient digital life with us. For any feedback, queries or issues pertaining to AU 0101 application, please write to tech.support@aubank.in

Steps to register:

Non-AU Bank Customer: If you do not have an existing relationship with AU Bank [Savings / Current Account], you simply need to click on register on the AU 0101 App and input your name, Email ID and submit to register.
AU Bank Customer: If you already have an account / have taken a Credit Card from AU Bank, you can register on the AU 0101 App by selecting the desired Customer ID, set MPIN and enter Account / Debit Card details for authentication.

*Note: Registration with Debit Card is required to get complete transaction access.
descriptionShort: Introducing AU 0101, Gateway to Digital Life (official app of AU Bank)

Now enjoy a host of new services with AU 0101!

Choose from multiple Savings Account options, get assistance over a Video call, explore a range of investment options, set up automatic bill payments, make UPI payments, enjoy Lifestyle banking options like Hotel, Cab, Flights and Bus booking.

Please note we use multi-level security and encryptions for you to be rest assured that your data is safe with AU Small Finance Bank. We do not share any information with third parties without your initiation and confirmation.

Welcome to AU 0101 Mobile Banking App by AU Small Finance Bank. Our App is created to make digital banking secure, intuitive, easy to use, and transformative. It is designed with your comfort in mind and redefines how you bank, providing many features that fit your unique needs.

Check your account balance, request detailed statements and cheque books, and transfer funds seamlessly using various payment options such as IMPS, NEFT, RTGS, UPI Scan & Pay, and more. With just one click, make multiple fund transfers, schedule payments, and manage transfer limits effortlessly.

💳 Comprehensive Financial Solutions:

Apply for Vehicle Loans, Personal Loans, and Insurance directly through the Mobile Banking App. Invest confidently in IPOs, Mutual Funds, and Equities, and explore a range of Fixed Deposits and Recurring Deposits.

Open a zero-balance Savings Account, set up an instant Current Account, book Fixed Deposits, raise service requests, and transfer funds, all through the convenience of video calls. Your financial journey has never been this personalized and accessible.

Experience personalized Loan offers and indulge in lifestyle services like hotel, flight, and bus bookings, all at your fingertips.

📝 Easy Registration Process:

If you're new to AU Small Finance Bank, simply download the AU 0101 Mobile Banking App, input your name, email ID, and begin your banking journey with us.
